radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple diverticula within the sigmoid colon, a 9 cm inflamed segment of sigmoid colon demonstrating marked wall edema thickening and pericolonic fat stranding, an air and fluid collection just anterior to a sigmoid colon measuring 3 x 1.9 cm (previously 5 x 3 cm), two small fluid collections within the wall of the sigmoid colon likely representing intramural abscess, and a small amount of free fluid within the pelvis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The air and fluid collection just anterior to the sigmoid colon has decreased in size, suggesting communication with the bowel and auto-decompression.
